home.title: Lights, Camera, Action!
home.subtitle: The Virtual Warehouse for Visual Mavericks.
home.browsetitle: The ultimate resource for equipment rentals and management, designed for the visual communication Department.
home.equipmentRentalsDesc: From cameras to lights, we have everything you need to bring your visual communication projects to life.
home.equipmentManagementDesc: Our system allows you to track and manage equipment usage, repairs, and inventory with ease.
home.procurementDesc: Need to book a room? Our procurement system has got you covered.
home.faqsDesc: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about using the virtual warehouse system.
home.userGuidesDesc: Access step-by-step guides for getting started with the platform, managing equipment, and more.
home.contactUsDesc: Need assistance? Get in touch with our support team for help with any issues or inquiries.

warehouse.title: The Visual Nexus: Where Creativity Meets Equipment
warehouse.subtitle: Discover, reserve, and conquer your projects with the right tools

borrowPage.title: Gear Up for Your Journey
borrowPage.policy: When borrowing equipment, the return date will be agreed upon with the warehouse manager or lecturer. If a return date needs to be extended, the user must request an extension in advance and receive approval from the warehouse manager or lecturer. Failure to return equipment on the agreed-upon date may result in a late fee. All users are required to sign a digital signature acknowledging that they understand the borrowing terms and the return policy. Failure to comply with the return policy may result in restricted borrowing privileges or account suspension.
borrowPage.signatureText: By signing below, you agree to the terms and conditions of borrowing the item.
